Author: 3cats_in_atrenchcoat
Text: I hope between the two you if you can work out some healthy supports to work on a heathier lifestyle. It's always hard when people get involved in your personal shit but sometimes it's good to have a person you know will always love you and keep you on track.  I really hope this means a good change in the future and not the stress that often follows similar situations.
